title: So Riot doesn't have Mods.
body:
They use third party moderation for the forums, even though they boast that they have their own moderation staff. 

http://puu.sh/hCSNC.jpg

http://puu.sh/hCSZ1/3027bb3638.jpg

This is the company Riot uses to moderate our forums.... 

http://metaversemodsquad.com/work/

and according to one of our favorite fizz's who apparently held out this info on us... they have been hired and employed by Riot since before boards. So Riot isn't shit at moderation... they are shit when it comes to the company they use to moderate our forums.

Plx Wookie, explain why you guys can't trust US, those passionate enough in the community to keep it rolling to moderate... while you can trust some third party company that allowed L-word shit to get posted on your boards?


Meet your mods, GD.
